text:
Brazil Denies #India's Bharat Biotech GMP Certification - Approval of Covaxin #COVID19 #vaccine Delayed

Reinforces the importance of the Ocugen $OCGN partnership for the commercialization of #Covaxin and the uphill battle it faces.
